Body:
"""Test using max derivative of a species-looking profile.
        """
a, b, c = [51329.3528, 0.316147043, 0.0105018205]
times = np.linspace(0, 1, 10000)
mass_fraction = a * np.exp(-((times - b) / c) ** 2)
ignition_delays = simulation.get_ignition_delay(times, mass_fraction,
    'species', 'd/dt max')
assert np.allclose(ignition_delays[0], b - np.sqrt(1 / 2) * c, rtol=0.0001)
